A small mod for Minecraft 1.7.10 that prevents leaves from decaying, that's it. This can greatly improve the performance of the game in some cases.
It has no config file and should work fine with any mod that adds leaves (it can automatically patch them).

Use this if you suffer from performance issues in some biomes with big trees and such. You can also use it if you simply do not like how the decaying mechanic works.
It combines well with mods that add their own block physics system.

## Confirmed to work with:
- BiomesOPlenty
- ExtraBiomesXL
- Aether
- Pretty much any mod that extends the BlockLeaves class...
